title: Bush policemen
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Stanley Hawes and Lee Robinson
brief_description: The bush policeman’s beat, in the vast inland of Australia, takes him through strange and sometimes un-mapped places, to preserve law and order on the fringes of civilization. As the Mountie is to north-west Canada, so is the bush policeman to the wild, tropical north-west of Australia.
